name: Afterlife Ascent
description:
Escape Hell through the spout of a volcano!

Scoreboards for levels 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and the full game
You can press F8 to skip a level but it will hurt your time on the scoreboards.

Credits:

Donovan Rodgers
Lead Design, Programming and Title Art
Robert Brooks
Sound and Music
(except the title screen music)
Connor Kazem
Sprite Art
Jasper Benz
Level Design and Background Art

This game was a collaboration for the final project of a Video Game Development class. Apart from Donovan, nobody in the group has published a game before! So there might be a few bugs left over.
